TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlyphTypeface extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 指定与磁盘上的字体文件相对应的物理字体。

span.span: Specifies a physical font face that corresponds to a font file on the disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是低级别的文本对象对应于单个表面的字体系列所表示的 OpenType 字体文件，或已序列化为的文档中的内存块。The object is a low level text object that corresponds to a single face of a font family as represented by an OpenType font file, or serialized as a block of memory in a document. 正确要用于给定的逻辑字体中的字符运行通常由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]字体系统并记录在由生成的对象行格式设置文本和对象[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。The correct to use for a run of characters in a given logical font is normally determined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] font system and recorded in the objects generated by the object and line formatting text [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]. 提供属性和方法：The provides properties and methods for: - 获取字体的常见规格，如上升和下降到 em 大小的比率。Obtaining font face common metrics, such as the ratio of ascent and descent to em size. - 获取度量值、 轮廓和单个标志符号的位图。Obtaining metrics, outlines, and bitmaps for individual glyphs. - 在文档中的序列化。Serialization in a document. 以下列表描述的类型的应用程序方案演示了使用低级别的值控制对象提供。The following list describes the type of application scenarios that illustrate the value of using the low-level control that the object provides. - 可以使用固定的格式文档生成器以获取用于在文档容器中嵌入的字体的二进制映像A fixed format document generator may use the to obtain a binary image of the font for embedding in a document container - 打印机驱动程序可以使用获取字体字形轮廓、 位图或整个字体图像可查看将发送到打印机。A printer driver may use the to obtain font glyph outlines or bitmaps, or the entire font image for sending to the printer. - A查看器应用程序可以使用获取度量值和位图的信息。A viewer application may use the to obtain metric and bitmap information. 每个字形定义度量值，指定与其他的对齐方式。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 下图定义标志符号字符的指标值。The following graphic defines metric values for glyph characters. ![标志符号度量示意图](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "标志符号度量示意图")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 标志符号字符的指标值Metric values of glyph characters

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified font file location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新对象从指定的 OpenType 字体`typefaceSource`。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource`. 构造对象不使用样式模拟。The constructed object does not use style simulations. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建的新实例类通过指定字体文件位置。The following example shows how to create a new instance of the class by specifying a font file location. [!code-csharp[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#glyphtypefacesnippet1)] [!code-vb[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#glyphtypefacesnippet1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新对象从指定的 OpenType 字体`typefaceSource`和`styleSimulations`。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource` and `styleSimulations`.

value.span: 一个表示基线的 类型的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基线值表示从单元格顶部到相对于 em 大小的英语基线之间的距离。The baseline value represents the distance from cell top to English baseline relative to em size.

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ BottomSideBearings { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的标志符号中从黑盒下边缘到步进向量底端的距离。

span.span: Gets the distance from bottom edge of the black box to the bottom end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示距离信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 该键是一个标识标志符号的 。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph.

value.span: 该值是一个表示距离的 。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 黑色框的底部边缘时定义的步进宽度和字体单元格高度的对齐矩形中，值为正。The value is positive when the bottom edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height. 字体单元格高度处于垂直布局的水平维度。The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout. 黑色框的底部边缘延伸对齐矩形之外时，值为负。The value is negative when the bottom edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

span.span: A that indicates the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital letter, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的标志符号中从黑盒右边缘到步进向量右端的距离。

span.span: Gets the distance from the right edge of the black box to the right end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示距离信息的键/值对。

value.span: 该键是一个标识标志符号索引的 。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph index.

value.span: 该值是一个表示距离的 。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 黑色框的后边缘对齐矩形步进宽度和字体单元格高度由定义中时，值为正。The value is positive when the trailing edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height. 右边缘延伸对齐矩形之外时，值为负。The value is negative when the right edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

value.span: 一个表示删除线位置的 。

span.span: A that represents the strikethrough position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 带删除线位置值通常为正因为带删除线通常高于基准。The strikethrough position value is usually positive because the strikethrough is generally above the baseline.

span.span: A that indicates the strikethrough thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的标志符号中从垂直步进向量的顶端到黑盒上边缘的距离。

span.span: Gets the distance from the top end of the vertical advance vector to the top edge of the black box for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示距离信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 该键是一个标识标志符号索引的 。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph index.

value.span: 该值是一个表示距离的 。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 黑色框的上边缘时定义的高级高度和字体单元格高度的对齐矩形内，值为正。The value is positive when the top edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance height and font cell height. 字体单元格高度处于垂直布局的水平维度。The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout. 黑色框的上边缘延伸对齐矩形之外时，值为负。The value is negative when the top edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

summary.span: 获取 中的下划线位置。

span.span: Gets the position of the underline in the .

value.span: 一个表示下划线位置的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the position of the underline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下划线的位置相对于基线而是相对于的全身大小。The underline position is relative to the baseline and relative to the em size. 返回的位置值通常为负因为下划线通常低于基线。The returned position value is usually negative because an underline is usually below the baseline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体供应商者就可以在 URL 中，然后无法用于注册字体嵌入唯一的序列号。A font vendor could embed a unique serial number in the URL, which could then be used to register the font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本字符串格式有很大差异。Version strings vary significantly in format. 若要获取的数字值形式的版本，请使用-请不要尝试分析值属性。To obtain the version as a numeric value, use the —do not attempt to parse the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FaceNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FaceNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的字体的 Win32 字体名称。

span.span: Gets the Win32 face name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示 Win32 字体名称信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 face name information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 该值是一个表示 Win32 字体名称的字符串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 face name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字体未提供指定语言的名称，将以英语返回的字体名称。If the font does not provide a name for the specified language, it returns the face name in English. Win32 字体名称可能标识权重 （不是常规或加粗），和/或样式，但不是会标识 stretch 或其他权重。The Win32 face name may identify weights (other than regular or bold), and/or style, but may not identify stretch or other weights.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FamilyNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FamilyNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 对象表示的字体的 Win32 系列名称。

span.span: Gets the Win32 family name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含表示 Win32 系列名称信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 family name information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 该值是一个表示 Win32 系列名称的字符串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 family name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字体未指定的语言中，提供家族名称属性在英语中返回的系列名称。If the font does not provide a family name for the specified language, the property returns the family name in English. Win32 系列名称排除常规或加粗的权重和样式，但它还包括其他权重和 stretch。The Win32 family name excludes regular or bold weights and style, but it includes other weights and stretch.
